CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS services ( id BIGSERIAL PRIMARY KEY, price DECIMAL NOT NULL CHECK (price >= 0), name TEXT NOT NULL CHECK(256 > LENGTH(name)), location TEXT NOT NULL CHECK(1024 > LENGTH(location)), slot TEXT NOT NULL CHECK(32 > LENGTH(slot)), status TEXT NOT NULL CHECK(64 > LENGTH(status)), created_at TIMESTAMPTZ NOT NULL, updated_at TIMESTAMPTZ, deleted_at TIMESTAMPTZ );
ALTER TABLE services ADD COLUMN search tsvector GENERATED ALWAYS AS (to_tsvector('russian', replace(services.name, 'ั', 'ะต'))) STORED; CREATE INDEX services_search_index ON services USING GIN (search);
